column4: Can anyone help me figure out how to get my microphone to work? Trying to get Skype to work so I can call my mom for mother's day </shameless plea>
in a terminal do: alsamixer
oh you need skype installed?
Already is installed
alsamixer
hit m to unmute stuff and up and down to change volume
make sure you have the right Mic selected
how goes it?
Well, I tried using it before... part of the problem is that I don't know how the hell to use Sound Recorder to test it
why not use skype voice test?
um, you could install audacity...
Tried that too, but takes longer
Also tried Audacity and it has as many options as Sound Recorder
um.. in audacity you just hit r on your keyboard and start speaking. when you are done you hit space bar
Well, no. There are a lot of recorder options in Preferences and the playback also fails.
you need it set to hw:0,0 for both playback and mic
The recording device is hw: 0,0, but there's not even an option for playback device.
well record and see if there is a wav image
There is one that looks like noise... seeing if I can save and play it now
looks like your mic works
NO it doesn't
It's just noise
I was speaking into it at the time
and you are using an onboard mic?
